summary: Allows you to choose your secondary skills via Mod Configuration Menu. All secondary skills will progress slower and you can change the speed of their progression. All other skills will be your primary skills and will progress as usual. Nothing more.
descriptionHtml:
Allows you to choose your secondary skills via Mod Configuration Menu. All secondary skills will progress slower and you can change the speed of their progression. All other skills will be your primary skills and will progress as usual. Nothing more.

Allows you to use smithing, but not become a smith, allows you to parry with your double swords, but not become a warrior, allows you to make potions, but not become a thief.

Compatibility
Should be compatible with any mod. Doesn't change anything in the game.

How does it work
When you mark a skill in the MCM you get a perk that slows down the progression speed of this skill. When you remove the mark, game removes this perk from your character and this skill progress as usual. When you choose the speed of progression, script changes all perks to match this value.
Doesn't change anythign in the game. Only adds perks that slow down skills progression.

SkyUI & SKSE required.
